description: This former Zeon lieutenant fought alongside Gato in the One Year War, ultimately losing his arm in battle. Now the operator of a junkyard near the lunar metropolis of Von Braun City, Kelly secretly dreams of returning to the battlefield, and in his spare time he works to restore a leftover Zeon mobile armour. When he meets Kou, the two form a friendship based on their shared experience as warriors, but both men are well aware that if they meet in battle then it will be as enemies.
name: Kelly Layzner
